item.title: News
item.description: Early work v.0.2.0: use Hugo module, update icon toolkits, KaTeX and add this demo website. first commit – v0.1.0: initial work, a theme only for my personal website.

item.title: Overview
item.description: This is a Hugo theme I originally built for my personal website back in January 2020 (see this post for more details about my initial motivations). I decided to put more effort to it in September 2023 to make it better and share it on Hugo Themes. We I designed this website I wanted a layout with two navigation bars (one on each side), no header and no footer (on large and medium screens).
